an10.127:1.1: “Dasayime, bhikkhave, dhamma ekantanibbidaya viragaya nirodhaya upasamaya abhinnaya sambodhaya nibbanaya samvattanti, nannatra sugatavinaya.
an10.127:1.4: ime kho, bhikkhave, dasa dhamma ekantanibbidaya viragaya nirodhaya upasamaya abhinnaya sambodhaya nibbanaya samvattanti, nannatra sugatavinaya”ti.
